elements: The one who raised us; the one who made us what we are; the one who waits in exile, and will rise when we bring the Dawn.
Is an acquaintance so we can hijack the cult foundation recipe.

'To remake with fire; to end what will not change; to end all nights.' Annoint a Carcass Spark with fiercest alchemy. Find the flaw in the place that does not change. Bring the device there, with the key the undying sisters hold, and employ the most potent Mysteries of Opening. I have spoken.'
A shining cage of curved metal, enclosing a softly glowing fragment of ancient light. It might begin our Dawn, if we can rekindle it and purify it with the fiercest alchemy.
A radiant cage of curved metal, imprisoning a blazing mote of solar fire. If we can carry it to the place where the world's flaw colours the air, we can bring the Dawn.
This is alchemy's savage summit: the deadly blue of fire outpacing light. Touch it and die
A battered tangle of ben metal, enclosing a mote of drunkenly bobbing light. We must repair it before it collapses altogether!
|A flaring tangle of bent metal. A blazing mote of solar fire quivers fitfully within. We must repair it before it collapses altogether!
A poisoned, stuttering ingot of energetic alchemy. We must soothe its rage, and quickly!
Our fountain, our joy, who rests in exile until the greatest of Feasts.
Is an acquaintance so we can hijack the cult foundation recipe.
Our source, our inspiration, who dwells now in the Mansus.
Is an acquaintance so we can hijack the cult foundation recipe.
